- AS Roma is interested in Suso, but so far Giallorossi has not presented any offer for Spaniard.

- Ismael Bennacer will become the new AC Milan player. Arsenal had a week to present a counteroffer for Milan's proposal, but The Gunners did not intend to present it at all. Algerian should go to Milan for 16 million euros.

- AS Roma leads in the race for the signature of Jordan Veretout. Giallorossi offered 17 million euros plus 2 million euros as bonuses. replies.msg: 冇所謂

咩事

意大利警方周一在一次精心部署的突擊搜查行動中，在搜查祖雲達斯的激進球迷組織時破獲了一個大型軍火庫，當中包括有在新納粹極端份子手中的空對空導彈。

據報道，調查始於聲名狼藉的祖雲達斯激進球迷組織Drughi持有新納粹主義旗幟，警方突擊搜查更發現軍火庫，包括有自動步槍、手槍、穿甲子彈甚至是目前卡塔爾仍然使用的空對空導彈。

都靈DIGOS的主管卡路安巴表示︰「新法西斯及新納粹與一些極端組織有聯繫，特別是祖雲達斯的激進球迷組織Drughi，同時亦與更傳統的祖雲達斯球迷組織以及其他極右翼武裝份子有聯繫。」
新法西斯主義、暴力和種族主義長期以來都是意大利足球的禍害，正如英國《衛報》在去年牽涉高列巴尼遭種族歧視的事件後所詳述，問題似乎只是正在惡化。
呢隊嘢一向黑勢力強大
用導彈恐嚇球證
攞導彈去對家更衣室講數

我地之前仲同佢地罵戰，會唔會俾佢地炸架

Milan ask Man Utd for Bailly
After considering Liverpool’s €20m demand for Dejan Lovren excessive, it’s reported Milan are turning to Manchester United defender Eric Bailly.

The Rossoneri are seeking an experienced centre-back to partner Alessio Romagnoli for this season under new Coach Marco Giampaolo.

They have not disguised their interest in Lovren, but Liverpool want at least €20m, while the 30-year-old also commands a current salary of €5m per year net.

According to Tuttosport newspaper, Milan are looking at alternatives in the Premier League, such as 25-year-old Manchester United figure Bailly.

He was a huge €38m purchase from Villarreal in 2016, but never quite lived up to expectations.

As his contract is due to expire in June 2020, the Ivory Coast international could be available in a cut-price deal.

Benxxxxx係咪傳體檢緊

Milan will play Novara behind closed doors on Friday, while it seems that Marco Giampaolo will keep using his favorite formation also at Milan.

The Rossoneri have been training ahead of the new season for over a week now at Milanello, and coach Giampaolo has been trying to instill his ideas and philosophy of the game in his new players.

Giampaolo said in his official presentation last Monday that he hadn’t decided on a formation yet and wants to evaluate the players he has at his disposal first.

However, according to Sky Italia, the former Sampdoria coach has only worked on the 4-3-1-2 so far. This is no surprise as Giampaolo is a big admirer of this formation and used it in his previous clubs. Reports from earlier this week suggested that Marco, who is still missing Cutrone (returns tomorrow) and Paquetá (returns July 30), tried Suso in the trequartista role, behind André Silva and Piątek.

Meanwhile, the Diavolo will play their first friendly match of the pre-season on Friday against Novara at 10:30 CEST. It’ll be behind closed doors so it’s unclear whether it’ll be televised.
